name: Bubble Labs VR
description: Bubble Labs is perfect way to introduce people to VR. The controls were designed with beginners and kids in mind, so that people of all ages can play. Create, mold, and experiment with liquid physics using Nvidia's flex particle physics! You will be amazed with the physics and colors of this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 7 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or greater (cannot use AMD cards!) Storage: 25 MB available space Additional Notes: Only for use with Nvidia cards
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® intel i7-6700k Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or greater Storage: 25 MB available space
